amendment.description: Pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 1339, the amendment in the nature of a substitute printed in the bill is considered adopted.

action.text: Amendment in the nature of a substitute reported by the House Committee on Rules.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rules amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Rules amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
